Group hierarchy: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
The reduced cost was achieved by several factors:
1) Using standard S3 storage only for most recent accessed files. Files older than 1 month can be automatically transferred to S3 Infrequent Access storage.
3) Using Reserved instances for Amazon RDS for MySQL database
4) Using smaller EC2 and RDS instances
